dimensions:
Height: 242 x width:139 cm (95 1/4 x 54 3/4 in. )
Width is three pieces seamed together.
Height of repeat: 47cm (18 1/2in.)
title: Les Arts et les Sciences
medium: Printed by engraved roller (brown) and block (yellow ) on cotton plain weave
description: Four scenes , placed as 'islands' on a diamond lattice ground with stars. The scenes represent sculpture, architecture, musicm and perhaps painting. This is one panel from a bedcover. Quilted and lined.
name: Panel
